Edward R. Harrison, (1981). Cosmology: The Science of the Universe, Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, UK, p.242

"When we leap to defend conventional wisdom we should remember that it cannot be proved true but only be proved false, and science is lost without those few people who are bold enough to interrogate its treasured doctrines."
